game.name: Peaceful Gunner
game.shortDescription: Peace, love, and... GUNS! Peaceful Gunner is a shooter-defense game about good vibes. Shoot some magical flowers to turn soldiers into hippies and make the world a better place (or not).
game.shortDescriptionEn: Peace, love, and... GUNS! Peaceful Gunner is a shooter-defense game about good vibes. Shoot some magical flowers to turn soldiers into hippies and make the world a better place (or not).

reviewHighlights.text: One hitter quitter that gets very old very fast, but did I have $1 worth of fun with it? Yeah, I did.
Nice concept, peace and love for all :) Wish he had more cop variety.
